PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-03902019-04-26,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2018-1201 of September 25, 2018; and (2) designating the Minister of Democratic Institutions, as the Minister for the purposes of the Act
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2018-1201 of September 25, 2018; and (2) designating the MINISTER OF DEMOCRATIC INSTITUTIONS, who is not a member of the Treasury Board, as the Minister for the purposes of the Federal Public Sector Labour Relations Act.
AttachmentsAttachment
